summary: A small house situated behind the Inn in Riverwood to act as a basic house for new players.
descriptionHtml:
A small house situated behind the Inn in Riverwood to act as a basic house for new players. 

==Features== 
-A bed, set to be owned by the player 
-safe storage 
-Cooking pot 
-Wood Chopping Block 
-Tabletop Enchanter 
-Tabletop Alchemy lab 

==Requirements== 
Does not require any dlc or other mods. Should work fine in the Vanilla game. 

==Compatibility== 
Should be compatible with anything that doesn't modify that area of Riverwood. 

==Notes== 
This is my first mod. I decided to make this because I was so frustated with the fact that all the houses added to the Riverwood area where either huge (by comparison), or too flashy for my tastes. So I decided to figure out how the creation kit works and make one myself. Now like I said this is my first mod, so any constructive criticism, tips, or suggestions are appriciated. 

==Future Plans== 
I would like to add a small, no frills, house like this to all the villages in Skyrim eventually. But that will come when I undertsand the Creation Kit better.
author: GravityzCatz
